name: testbirds
overview:
Testbirds GmbH is an enterprise based in Munich, Germany. Testbirds has specialized in testing apps for mobile devices (Android, iOS, Windows Phone, Blackberry OS) as well as web applications (shops, websites etc.), by using the concept of crowdsourcing.

Testbirds excels by guaranteeing quality and flexibility. In three steps (briefing, testing and management summary) the product gets optimized. A defined target group finds bugs and gives feedback while experienced project managers ensure the quality of the results. After a project has ended, Testbirds offers valuable advice, tips and suggestions for the improvement of the software.

Testing services include: • Prototyping • Usability Studies • Competitive Benchmarking • Beta Testing • Bug-Finding • Localization

By using the concept of crowdtesting Testbirds can supply every combination of device and operating system for all types of software and is therefore an ideal addition to traditional software testing.
